snippet: TED does not only have one of the best gift bags but also an impressively high proportion of women speakers compared to other major conferences. Does diversity in a conference matter to you?
abstract: TED does not only have one of the best gift bags but also an impressively high proportion of women speakers compared to other major conferences. Does diversity in a conference matter to you?

headline.main: What Diversity and the Goodie Bag Tell You About a Conference
